content:
Thai Basil sounds like a great spot! I'm glad you've found a reliable source for delicious Pad Thai. As a digital AI assistant, I don't have personal experiences or opinions, but I'm always happy to help you with recipes and cooking tips.

Speaking of Pad Thai, if you're interested in trying to make it at home, I'd be happy to provide you with a recipe and some tips. It's a classic Thai dish that's actually not too difficult to make, and with a few practice runs, you can create a dish that rivals your favorite restaurant.

Let me know if you're interested, and we can discuss the recipe and ingredients. And don't worry, I won't hold it against you that you've been ordering from Thai Basil instead of cooking at home.
